PHRASE.LANG: Harness the power of the gods in your own apartment. Includes Horus, Sekhmet, Anubis and Sobek Statues for a total of 4 pieces! [#Legal]
Les Dieux répandent leur puissance chez vous! Ce pack contient les statuettes de 3 dieux et 1 déesse égyptiens: Horus, Anubis, Sobek et Sekhmet. [#Legal]
Jetzt kommt die Macht der Götter in jedes Apartment. Enthält: Horus-, Sekhmet-, Anubis- und Sobek-Statuen. Ein vierteiliges Set also! [#Legal]
Porta il potere degli dei nel tuo appartamento! Include le statue di Horus, Sekhmet, Anubi e Sobek, per un totale di 4 pezzi! [#Legal]
Alberga el poder de los dioses en tu propio piso. Incluye estatuas de Horus, Sekhmet, Anubis y Sobek, ¡un total de 4 piezas! [#Legal]
Harness the power of the gods in your own apartment. Includes Horus, Sekhmet, Anubis and Sobek Statues for a total of 4 pieces! [#Legal]
당신의 퍼스널 스페이스에 고대 신의 힘을 불어 넣으십시오. 호루스, 세크메트, 아누비스, 그리고 소벡을 포함합니다.[#Legal]
Harness the power of the gods in your own apartment. Includes Horus, Sekhmet, Anubis and Sobek Statues for a total of 4 pieces! [#Legal]
在你的居所裡集合眾神的力量。組合包包括四件道具：荷魯斯守護神、女戰神賽克美特、死神阿努比斯及索貝克鱷魚神。[#Legal]
